name: [Your Name]
description: IT Manager Analyst Candidate | Senior Product Designer

sections.title: About Me
sections.content: Senior Product Designer with 7+ years of experience leading digital product strategy for FinTech, SaaS, and Media sectors. Specialist in analyzing complex business requirements and translating them into intuitive user interfaces and logical workflows. Proven track record in managing product lifecycles, optimizing user journeys for high-volume transaction systems, and bridging the gap between business stakeholders and technical engineering teams.

items.title: Senior Product Designer (Strategy Lead) at TabSquare
items.description: Key Focus: Enterprise Product Design & FinTech. Designed high-velocity kiosk interfaces for 200+ enterprise clients and led strategy for smart terminal payments achieving SGD 10,000 monthly transaction volume.

items.title: Product Design Mentor at Binar Academy
items.description: Key Focus: Education & Talent Development. Mentored a diverse cohort of 25 students with a 20% immediate placement rate within 3 months.

items.title: Product Designer (Platform Transformation) at The Shonet
items.description: Key Focus: Scalability & Design Systems. Led the pivot of a 5M+ view media platform to Social Commerce and engineered an internal dashboard reducing manual workload by 60%.

items.title: UI/UX Designer at Qerja
items.description: Key Focus: Microservices & QA. Managed lifecycle for QTrainer Dashboard and 3 microservices. Standardized design audits and UAT protocols.

items.title: UI Designer at ManyPixels
items.description: Key Focus: Service Delivery. Successfully executed 90+ client tickets with 100% satisfaction rate in a high-volume global agency environment.

items.title: UI/UX Designer at ReadyDok Indonesia
items.description: Key Focus: Mobile App Design. Re-engineered mobile booking workflows to remove friction points and aligned digital platforms with new business visions.

items.title: UI/UX Designer Intern at Ruangguru
items.description: Selected top 9% of 1100+ applicants. Conducted rigorous usability testing for 'Ruangbelajar' to drive data-backed product redesigns.

items.title: Telkom University
items.description: Bachelor of Computer Science, Informatics Engineering (GPA: 3.19). Coursework: Database Modeling, Data Structures, Software Engineering.

sections.title: Core Competencies
sections.content:
Hard Skills: Product Lifecycle Management (PLM), Quantitative & Qualitative Analysis, SQL, Advanced Excel, UAT. 
Soft Skills: Strategic Planning, Stakeholder Management, Analytical Thinking.
